turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Fuad.
turn.1: What is the meaning of the name Fuad?
turn.2: Fuad  Fouad (Arabic: فؤاد) (also spelled Foud, Fuaad or Foad, ) is a masculine Arabic given name, meaning "heart".
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Its root word is the verb "fa'ada" meaning burning or a flame and "lahmun fa'eed" means a roasted meat on a fire.
turn.5: Is the name used in any other language?
turn.6: It is used to describe a heart that is inflamed with emotion.
turn.7: Is the name associated with anyone famous?
turn.8: It was borne by two different Kings of Egypt.
turn.10: Originally an Arabic given name , it became widespread throughout the Middle East during the 9th and 12th centuries.
turn.11: Is the name used in any religious texts?
turn.12: The name is mentioned five times in the Quran.
